definition: half a life/only half alive/barely alive/(scared, beaten etc) half to death
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc

sentences.english: It's the year of the shooter, and Half-Life and Unreal are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 這是一年的射手，和半條命和虛幻的介紹。

sentences.english: Water and fish through a river, the fish only Half-Life.
sentences.chinese: 水和魚經過了一條大河，魚只剩下半條命。

sentences.english: Half a life is better than no breath.
sentences.chinese: 半條命也比全無氣息強。

sentences.english: Lost half lot a few days ago, alas true regrettablly, return remnant fortunately half.
sentences.chinese: 前幾天丟了半條命，唉真可惜，幸好還剩半條。

sentences.english: Would there be an actual End of the Half-life story, considering some comercial purposes?
sentences.chinese: 出於商業目的，《半條命》的故事會有結局麼？

sentences.english: On this day ten years ago, Half-Life was unleashed on the world.
sentences.chinese: 在這一天十幾年前，半條命是發動世界。

sentences.english: I mean Half-LifeAPI Cast Steel Valves 2 Episode Three anyone?
sentences.chinese: 我的意思是，半條命2集三，任何人嗎？

keenly felt pain/bitter anguish
(not) a single person/(no) one
viewing time
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5

definition: grand dreams/unrealistic ideas (idiom)
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
A rabbit doesn't eat the grass by its own burrow (idiom); One shouldn't do anything to harm one's neighbors.
pinyin: tu4 zi5 bu4 chi1 wo1 bian1 cao3

definition: to repair a tire
to go around in circles/to make a detour/(fig.) to beat about the bush
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
telephone set
to exhaust one's limited abilities (idiom)
cold-blooded animal/fig. cold-hearted person
Please do as you wish!/You are welcome to do whatever you like!/Please make yourself at home.
